item.description:
Here's the details for the New England Light Sport Expo.

Let's leave early, about 8am for KSFM. http://www.airnav.com... 68nm.

Anyone other than me interested???

The Town of Sanford, Maine is excited about hosting the New England Light Sport Expo on August 16th and 17th. Special-Light Sport Aircraft (SLSA) manufacturers and dealers have been invited to bring their airplanes to the Sanford Regional Airport (KSFM) so that area pilots can compare the planes wing-tip-to-wing-tip. As an added benefit, they will offer inexpensive demonstration flights throughout the events.....

http://www.nelsexpo.c...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: New England Light Sport Expo in Sanford
